pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Stress Relief Roll On Essential Oil 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Stress Relief with Sweet Orange, Mandarin, Lavender, Bergamot & Cedarwood essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to assist in the management of stress.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Application to skin may cause sensitivity to sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children.
Not to be taken.
Not to be used neat.
Store below 30°C.
Do not use if seal is around lid is damaged.

Common Uses

The calming effects of Sweet Orange, Mandarin, Lavender, Bergamot and Cedarwood essential oils have been traditionally used in aromatherapy as natural sedatives during times of stress to help relieve nervous tension, sleeplessness, headaches, neuralgia, fatigue and mild anxiety, providing a sense of calm and comfort.

Ingredients

Each mL of PURE ESSENTIAL OIL contains:
Citrus sinensis (Sweet Orange Oil) Fruit peel 31.50µL, Citrus reticulata (Mandarin Oil) Fruit peel 14µL, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender Oil) Herb top flowering 10.50µL, Citrus aurantium (Bergamot Oil) Fruit peel 10.50µL, Juniperus virginiana (Virginian Cedarwood Oil) Wood 3.50µL, Grape Seed Oil 625µL, Prunis dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil) 300µL, Covi-ox T-70 (Natural Vitamin E) 5µL.

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day)
